rich-text-icon.label: Rich text icon:
rich-text-icon.description: Copy this tag and paste it in-game into a text to get the icon instead.

cheat-command.label: Cheat command:
cheat-command.description: Execute this command in the in-game console to cheat the item into your inventory. This will disable achievements!

footer.copyright-disclaimer: All content and images are owned by <1>Wube Software</1> and the <3>mod authors</3> respectively.

machine.character-notice: This recipe can be crafted by hand without additional machines as long as the required items are in the inventory.
machine.headline: Producible in {{count}} machine

locale.label: Language:
locale.description: Languages are only supported as long as the mods provide translations for them. Missing translations will fall back to English.

recipe-mode.label: Recipe mode:
recipe-mode.description: The recipe mode defines how to handle recipes with multiple variants by either showing both variants (hybrid mode) or omitting the uninteresting one (normal and expensive mode).

button.select-or-drag: Select your <1>mod-list.json</1> file or drag it here.

message.invalid-file: The selected file was invalid and could not be processed. Are you sure you selected a valid mod-list.json file?
message.no-mods: The selected file did not contain any mods. Are you sure you selected a valid mod-list.json file?

available.headline: Data is available.
available.description: The data for your combination of mods is already available. Save the new setting and start browsing!

errored.headline: Data export has failed.
errored.description: A previously triggered data export of these mods has failed. Sorry, but the required data cannot be made available at this point.

pending.headline: Data export is pending.
pending.description: The data export of these mods has already been triggered and is currently waiting to get its turn.

unknown.headline: Data is currently not available.
unknown.description: The data for these mods is currently not available and a data export will get triggered when saving the new setting.
